root.name: Cool Boarders 4
root.description: This snowboading marvel is the first in the franchise to include new tricks such as the hand plants, method melons, staledish tweaks and more. It features 30 courses that are full of huge jumps and drops that put your gaming skills to the test. Downh hill half pipe and big air competitions are only a small part of the events this game has to offer. Cool Boarders 4 offers the player a chance to play as real proffesionnals such as Jim Rippey, JP Walker, Michele Taggart. Furthermore the game also features the 13 year old Shawn White who had just began his carrer. This mention of Shawn White, ten year prior to the release of his very own video game, is probably his first appearance Mr. White has made in a video game. The game feature not only real pros but realk boards too. Companies like Burton, Forum, K2, MLY, M3, Salomon, Ride, Morrow and Santa Cruz have 32 boards that the player can buy customize and ride.
